data: In the late War between the French and the Confederate Armies, there were two BROTHERS, who had acquir’d a more than ordinary Reputation, under the Command of the great and intrepid LUXEMBOURGH.

In the late War between the _French_ and the _Confederate_ Armies, there were two BROTHERS, who had acquir’d a more than ordinary Reputation, under the Command of the great and intrepid LUXEMBOURGH.

Love in Excess; or, the Fatal Enquiry
A Novel in Three Parts
